sentences.en: 23 million people in Africa are &B{at risk from} starvation.
sentences.cn: 非洲有2,300万人正处于饥饿的危险中。

sentences.en: at risk youth in the inner cities; at-risk groups of children not having received the vaccine.
sentences.cn: 市中心贫民区遭受危险的青少年；没有种植牛痘疫苗的处境危险的孩子

sentences.en: at the risk of boring people to tears, I repeat the most important rule in painting.
sentences.cn: 冒着使人厌烦得要死的风险，我重复了最重要的绘画规则。

sentences.en: He risked his life helping others to escape.
sentences.cn: 他冒着生命危险去帮助其他人逃离。

sentences.en: he visited prisons at considerable risk to his health.
sentences.cn: 他冒着健康受损的极大危险去巡视监狱。

sentences.en: Higher returns and higher risk usually go hand in hand.
sentences.cn: 更高的收益通常伴随着更高的风险。

sentences.en: I took the risk and hoped for the best.
sentences.cn: 我冒了这个险，心里祈祷能够诸事顺利。

sentences.en: I'm a blood donor; I can't risk any contagion.
sentences.cn: 我是献血者，我不能冒任何接触传染的危险。

sentences.en: I’m not going to risk my neck (= risk my life ) just to save a common criminal.
sentences.cn: 我才不会冒死去救一个惯犯。

sentences.en: It was a risk, sending a letter to my house.
sentences.cn: 将信寄到我家是冒险。

sentences.en: Meat from the infected animals is regarded as a serious health risk (= something likely to harm people’s health ) .
sentences.cn: 受感染动物的肉被认为对健康有严重威胁。

sentences.en: Obesity correlates with increased risk for hypertension and stroke.
sentences.cn: 肥胖会增加高血压和中风发作的几率。

sentences.en: People should eat less fat to reduce the risk of heart disease.
sentences.cn: 人们应该减少脂肪摄入，以降低患心脏病的危险。

sentences.en: Science has determined that the risk is very small.
sentences.cn: 科学已经探明其危险性非常小。

sentences.en: she preferred not to &B{run the risk of} encountering his sister.
sentences.cn: 她宁可不冒与他姐姐发生冲突的危险。

sentences.en: Skiers always face the risk of serious injury.
sentences.cn: 滑雪者始终面临着受重伤的风险。

sentences.en: The consensus is that risk factors have an accumu-lative effect.
sentences.cn: 危险因素会与日俱增已成为共识。

sentences.en: The crisis could well place the relationship at risk.
sentences.cn: 这场危机可能会使这一关系有破裂的危险。

sentences.en: The man must be bonkers to take such a risk.
sentences.cn: 这人一定是疯了，居然去冒这种风险。

sentences.en: The officers had run the risk of being dismissed.
sentences.cn: 这些警官冒了被开除的风险。

sentences.en: They ran the risk of being shot at any moment.
sentences.cn: 他们冒着随时会中弹的危险。

sentences.en: they undertook the adventure at their own risk.
sentences.cn: 他们从事冒险活动，后果自负。

sentences.en: This could intensify the risk of a nuclear exchange.
sentences.cn: 这可能会加剧爆发核战争的危险。

sentences.en: Toolbelts free both hands and lessen the risk of dropping hammers.
sentences.cn: 工具腰带解放了双手，还减少了锤子掉落的风险。

sentences.en: When children start smoking, they don’t realize that they’re risking their health.
sentences.cn: 小孩子学抽烟的时候并没有意识到这是在拿自己的健康去冒险。

sentences.en: Why risk life and limb (= risk your life and health ) jumping out of a plane just to raise money for charity?
sentences.cn: 何必为了慈善募捐去玩命跳飞机呢？

sentences.en: You could never eliminate risk, but preparation and training could attenuate it.
sentences.cn: 风险不可能完全消除，但可以通过防范和培训来降低。

sentences.en: You're taking a big risk showing this to Kravis.
sentences.cn: 你把这个给克拉维斯看会有很大的风险。

words.tran_cn: 危险的；冒险的；（作品等）有伤风化的

phrases.tran_cn: 在可能危及自己（或某事物）的情况下
处境危险，遭受危险：处于危险之中，如因疾病或缺少父母或家庭的教导及适当的医疗保健

phrases.phrase: at the risk of doing something

phrases.tran_cn: 信用风险；信贷风险；信用危机
操作风险；经营风险；运作风险
危险人物；不可靠分子；对国家安全的危害

trans.tran_en: the possibility that something bad, unpleasant, or dangerous may happen
to put something in a situation in which it could be lost, destroyed, or harmed

trans.tran_cn: 冒…的危险； 使遭受危险
trans.tran_en: to put something in a situation in which it could be lost, destroyed, or harmed
the possibility that something bad, unpleasant, or dangerous may happen
to put something in a situation in which it could be lost, destroyed, or harmed
